data.title: Rock N Roll Bedtime Stories – Story Guys
data.text:
Episode 209 – Lenny Kravitz vs “Justify My Love”

A listener's curiosity regarding a relationship between Lenny Kravitz and Madonna leads the guys to uncover a song-centered story full of steamy videos, stolen credit, and a whole new musical genre. SHOW NOTES: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justify_My_Love https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madonna https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maripol https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roxie_Roker https://people.com/music/all-about-lenny-kravitz-parents/ https://madonna-infinity.net/forums/topic/27511-lenny-kravitz-looks-back-at-recording-madonnas-justify-my-love-30-years-later/ Sean Lennon interview: https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=1853309328129779 https://parade.com/celebrities/lenny-kravitz-wife#: https://store.lennykravitz.com/products/let-love-rule-book https://www.eonline.com/news/996145/lenny-kravitz-opens-up-about-his-ex-nicole-kidman-and-if-he-ever-dated-madonna Yahoo Entertainment Interview (2020):https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9sjtqBRXdCA https://www.stereogum.com/2165394/the-number-ones-madonnas-justify-my-love/columns/the-number-ones/ https://insheepsclothinghifi.com/in-conversation-ingrid-chavez/ Ingrid Chavez - [...]

Episode 209 – Lenny Kravitz vs “Justify My Love”

Episode 208 – REM vs Friends

The guys get nostalgic 90's-style with a discussion centered around the possible theme-song thievery that could have happened with one of the most popular sitcoms of all time! SHOW NOTES: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Quick_(American_band) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cruzados https://trouserpress.com/reviews/great-buildings/ The Quick - No No Girl - https://open.spotify.com/track/7noiFN2ziO9szNJHEhVP5o?si=913b14056d9b49b9 Great Buildings - Hold Onto Something - https://open.spotify.com/track/64nFgPDGTTf2SvabXiQ1JT?si=f8853c5f7b304054 https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1992-12-13-ca-3950-story.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Rembrandts https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atco_Records https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I%27ll_Be_There_for_You_(The_Rembrandts_song) https://friends.fandom.com/wiki/Marta_Kauffman [...]

Episode 208 – REM vs Friends

Episode 207 – Godsmack vs Story of the Year

A listener asks about a twenty-year-old rumor that has Brian flexing his knowledge about emo and Murdock finding a way to tie the whole thing to - you guessed it - Motley Crue. Hear the guys dig up the details (at least according to one party) of what happened backstage at a radio show in [...]

Episode 207 – Godsmack vs Story of the Year

BONUS – Mailbag: More on Dio, hip hop and CDs

The guys read through some new listener letters and talk about Australian cartoons, college dorm posters and more. SHOW NOTES: The Dio cartoon song: https://youtu.be/BR6pYICqZT0?si=-jsphBlQy0G2ERtX (Thanks for sending, Mat!)

BONUS – Mailbag: More on Dio, hip hop and CDs

Episode 206 – Rockstars vs good impressions

The guys tackle a pair of letters - one about Slipknot and the other about Tom Waits - BOTH about major food brands cashing in on impersonations. SHOW NOTES: Slipknot https://www.loudersound.com/features/remember-the-time-slipknot-tried-to-sue-burger-king-over-a-chicken-fries-ad https://www.loudersound.com/news/ross-robinson-did-not-like-slipknot-the-first-time-he-heard-them https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slipknot_(band) https://www.loudersound.com/features/the-definitive-history-of-every-slipknot-mask https://beat.com.au/the-bronx-2/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BK_Chicken_Fries https://slate.com/business/2012/01/crispin-porter-bogusky-how-the-hot-ad-agency-fell-from-grace.html https://www.nytimes.com/2005/07/25/business/advertising-addenda-from-burger-king-music-to-eat-chicken-by.html https://www.tomzukoski.com/Burger-King-Coq-Roq-Integrated-Campaign https://www.thesmokinggun.com/documents/celebrity/slipknots-burger-king-beef Tom Waits https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1990-05-09-me-238-story.html https://www.reuters.com/technology/scarlett-johansson-says-openai-chatbot-voice-eerily-similar-hers-2024-05-21/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Waits https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Small_Change_(Tom_Waits_album) https://www.songfacts.com/facts/tom-waits/step-right-up http://tomwaitslibrary.info/biography/interviews/tom-waits-is-flying-upside-down-on-purpose/ Dog food commercial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qYOMPU18QjA https://www.dallasobserver.com/music/the-variations-of-tom-waits-6400869
